summary:
Recolor but NOT replacer vanilla items. 
It is a full set of equipment of a reptile which will give the chance to you to feel itself as it, being a being of other race.
descriptionHtml:
Recolor but NOT replacer vanilla items. 
It is a full set of equipment of a reptile which will give the chance to you to feel itself as it, being a being of other race.
Adds the complete set of the enchanted clothes, a ring, an amulet, one-hand weapon, bow and arrows. Arrows can be made also in a smithy in section a miscellaneous.
The owner of these things the Reptile-stinging-a-canine disappears on a Mixwater Mill. 

Male and Female versions. 

Install 
1.Nexus Mod Manager->Activate
2.Unpack archive to Steam->SteamApps->Common->Skyrim->Data
At game start in section files note a tick this esp file.
author: MedicalAndroid
